EmailTemplate.name: Validation_Revision
EmailTemplate.subject: Lease Contract Validation - {!Account.Name} - New Lease
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Account_Owner__c},
We are in the process of validating the lease of the above homeowner and we noticed that there is an existing signed lease ({!Contract.ContractNumber}). Is this a revision? If yes, please provide us the reason for revision.
Moving forward, for revision process you can proceed initiating cancellation to the existing lease or provide Notes in customer's account. We cannot proceed with the new lease unless reason for having a new lease has been provided.
Should you have further questions, please let us know.
Thank you & Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} | Financial Products Originations SunPower | PO BOX 82387, Austin, TX 78708-2387 | Office 1-800-786-7693 | Fax 1-512-684-0288 | SunpowerFinancing@sunpower.com
